articles.title: Is the Universe Changing? Breakthrough Data Suggests Dark Energy Is Evolving - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Using data from nearly 15 million galaxies and quasars, the Dark Energy Spectroscopic Instrument (DESI) has created the most detailed 3D map of the universe ever made. A new analysis combining DESI’s observations with other major cosmic datasets suggests that…
articles.content: For years, scientists have believed dark energy was a constant force driving the expansion of the universe. But new findings from the DESI experiment suggest this might not be true. By creating the l… [+10112 chars]

articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: A high schooler built a website that lets you challenge AI models to a Minecraft build-off - TechCrunch
articles.description: A high schooler built a website that compares the Minecraft building skills of two AI models. Users vote for which they think is the best.
articles.content: As conventional AI benchmarking techniques prove inadequate, AI builders are turning to more creative ways to assess the capabilities of generative AI models. For one group of developers, that’s Mine… [+3264 chars]
